definitions.definition: a confident and forceful statement of fact or belief.
examples: his assertion that his father had deserted the family
synonyms: avowal; Moreformalaverment; rareasseveration "I questioned his assertion"

definitions.definition: the action of stating something or exercising authority confidently and forcefully.
examples: the assertion of his legal rights
synonyms: upholding of; insistence on "an assertion of the right to march"
